TextView.android:text: In this event the participants will be given the facts of a case where they will have to frame leading questions according to the case given.

Rules of The Trial (Cross Examination)
 1. Participants have to register themselves at the venue on the day of the event
 2. Each participant will be given one situation 15 minutes prior to the competition.
 3. Each participant will further draft a questionnaire and present it within the span of 7 minutes.
 4. Any kind of malpractice or misbehavior will not be entertained.
 Judging Criteria:
 1. The best questionnaire will be awarded.
 2. Merit certificates will be awarded to the best participant.
 3. The decision of the judge is sole and discretionary.

*Note: Any kind of changes regarding the events will be solely the decision of the organizers on the basis of the situation and cannot be questioned.
